userInput.promptText: Please provide a reason why we are not running a technical evaluation:

Flow.description: Removed Tech Evaluation creation at stage 2 --> 3
Flow.interviewLabel: Opportunity - Next Stage Button {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime} {!recordId.Name} from stage {!recordId.StageName}
Flow.label: Opportunity - Next Stage Button

fields.name: Error
fields.fieldText:
Error: You cannot update the stage on this opportunity right now:


{!Get_global_permission.Reason__c}

fields.name: to_stage_3_ent
fields.fieldText: To advance this opportunity to the next stage, please provide or confirm the following:

fields.name: cvo_s3
fields.fieldText:
Customer Value Framework:


  • Any pre-existing Retool product knowledge / customer experience / technical expertise
  • Top 1-3 Use Cases that tie to core Positive Business Outcomes
  • Validated technical feasibility
  • Champion: Suspected or potential 
  • Competition: How they would solve the identified pain (or gain) without Retool (i.e. what is their alternative?)
  • Differentiators: How Retool is uniquely & comparatively positioned to win against the identified competitors

fields.name: Use_Cases
fields.fieldText: Use Cases

fields.name: After_Scenarios
fields.fieldText: After Scenarios

fields.name: Positive_Business_Outcomes
fields.fieldText: Positive Business Outcomes

fields.name: C_Competition
fields.fieldText: [C] Competition

fields.name: competitor_footnote
fields.fieldText: Hold ⌘ and click to select multiple competitors

fields.name: Differentiators
fields.fieldText: Differentiators

fields.name: to_stage_4_ent
fields.fieldText: To advance this opportunity to the next stage, please provide or confirm the following:

fields.name: cbo_s4
fields.fieldText:
Customer Verifiable Outcomes﻿


  • Decision Process: Agreement on a specific validation approach to prove out use cases or required capabilities as well as supporting success metrics
  • Economic Buyer identified, path to engage with them, and preliminary understanding of their priorities and approach to quantify them
  • Validation the champion is a true champion 
  • Preliminary pricing discussed & deemed feasible
  • Understanding of competitive landscape and shape evaluation criteria 
  • Customer agrees to commit necessary resources (e.g., infrastructure or personnel) for technical validation

fields.name: D_Decision_Process
fields.fieldText: [D] Decision Process

fields.name: Required_Capabilities
fields.fieldText: Required Capabilities

fields.name: Metrics
fields.fieldText: Metrics

fields.name: to_stage_6_ent
fields.fieldText: To advance this opportunity to the next stage, please provide or confirm the following:

fields.name: cvo_3
fields.fieldText:
Customer Verifiable Outcomes:


  • Economic Buyer & Finance sign off on business case
  • Aligned on specific proposal (incl. pricing details)
  • Paper Process: Agreement on all key business, legal, and other deal requirements 
  • Agreement sent for signature

fields.name: P_Paper_Process_ent
fields.fieldText: [P] Paper Process

fields.name: to_stage_6_ent_0_0
fields.fieldText: To advance this opportunity to the next stage, please provide or confirm the following:

fields.name: cvo_5
fields.fieldText:
Customer Verifiable Outcomes


  • Validation from Economic Buyer & Champion that we have won the technical evaluation (if one was performed)
  • Commitment from the Champion to build a Mutual Action Plan (MAP) together
  • Draft business case reviewed with the Champion

fields.name: tech_eval_header
fields.fieldText: A technical evaluation is an engagement where we partner with the customer to assess Retool's fit for their use cases and success criteria, and can take different forms (e.g. custom demo, workshop, POC).

fields.name: tech_eval_question
fields.fieldText: As part of this deal, will the customer be performing a technical evaluation of Retool?
